testset.name: unary_ops_pass
testset.snippet: int i = 0; ++i;
int i = 0; i++;
int i = 0; --i;
int i = 0; i--;
int i = 0; -i;
int i = 0; +i;
int i = 0; !i;

testset.name: binary_ops_pass
testset.snippet: int i = 0; i = i + 1;
int i = 0; i = i - 1;
int i = 0; i = i * 2;
int i = 2; i = i % 2;

testset.name: bitwise_ops_pass
bitwise_ops_fail
